app.name: SosioMap
app.description: A map based social media apps to share and discuss everything around you

error.geolocation_not_supported: Get location is not supported in this device!
error.message_at_least_minimum: The message should be at least 5 characters long!
error.feature_need_geolocation: Location data must be activated to use this feature!
error.max_file: Maximum number of files is {max} files!

url.social_media_post_desc: Paste the URL of the social media post you want to connect with.

post.what_do_you_want_to_share_today: What do you want to share today?

topic.main_topics_desc: Main Topics is a common topics that you can share and discuss in this apps.
topic.pemilu_2024_desc: Pemilu 2024 is an Indonesia events for choosing President and Legislative Candidates in 2024.
topic.open_topics_desc: Create your own topic and share it in Open Topics section. You can find topic that created by other user too.

main.user_stories_desc: Share your stories and other activities here.
main.events_desc: Discover and share information about community events.
main.news_desc: Stay updated with the latest news.
main.tourism_desc: Discuss and share information related to tourism.
main.traffic_desc: Get and share information about traffic conditions, accident, and other transportations things.
main.environment_desc: Discuss and share information about the surrounding environment.
main.disaster_desc: Get and share information about disasters.
main.social_desc: Engage in social interactions and share social activities.
main.marketplace_desc: Find, buy and sell any product around your location.

pemilu2024.dpr_desc: Find and check DPR legislative candidates in your area.
pemilu2024.dpd_desc: Find and check DPD legislative candidates in your area.
pemilu2024.dprd_provinsi_desc: Find and check DPRD Province legislative candidates in your area.
pemilu2024.dprd_kab_kota_desc: Find and check DPRD Regency/City legislative candidates in your area.
pemilu2024.kecurangan_desc: Report and share fraud or cheating of any President, Political Party, and/or Legislative Candidates.
pemilu2024.spanduk_ilegal_desc: Report and share Illegal Banner that installed in your area.
